title: Polly and the Black Ink - Book V: The Last Door
description: The Last door...Polly Mason has collected the doors of everyone she knows. Friends and family, enemies and foes, heroes and villains. These doors, which have kept their secrets safe, have also taken her into magical worlds, allowing her to know people better for who they truly are. Although Polly Mason can visit any of their worlds, she cannot enter her own. It's up to her friends to save her core now, and no one thought her world could be so challenging and full of wonder. Polly and the Black Ink is an all-ages graphic novel of parallel fantasy worlds created by their imagination. Amazing worlds that must be rescued from the grip of an epic villain.
author: Vanessa Bettencourt
